coffees.name: Colombia Antioquia Amaga Supremo
coffees.notes: Sweet, nutty, and smooth cup; medium body and acidity.

coffees.name: Decaffeinated Columbia Royal Select MWP
coffees.notes: Chocolatey sweetness with gentle fruit and nutty tones; Mountain Water Process.

coffees.name: Decaffeinated Indian Monsooned Malabar MWP
coffees.notes: Spicy cocoa sweetness with mellow acidity and heavy body; Monsooned and Mountain Water Process.

coffees.name: Decaffeinated Indonesia Sumatra Mandheiling MWP
coffees.notes: Earthy cocoa, cedar, and sweet tobacco notes with syrupy body; Mountain Water Process.

coffees.name: Decaffeinated Brazil Mogiana 15/16 Royal Select SWP
coffees.notes: Creamy body with milk chocolate, toasted sugar, and nutty sweetness; Royal Select Swiss Water Process.

coffees.name: Colombia Supremo EP Huila
coffees.notes: Balanced acidity, delicate medium body; tart fruit sweetness with bittersweet dark cocoa finish; caramel, milk chocolate, cherry notes.

coffees.name: Guatemala Huehuetenango (HHT)
coffees.notes: Caramel, apple, baking spice; balanced acidity

coffees.name: Mysore Nuggets
coffees.notes: Spicy chocolate notes, syrupy body; prized Indian arabica.

coffees.name: Sumatra Mandheling G1 Aceh
coffees.notes: Earthy, chocolate, cedar, sweet tobacco, spice; creamy/syrupy full body with mild to low acidity; toffee, lemongrass, dried fruit nuances.

coffees.name: Peru High Manco
coffees.notes: Chocolate, Vanilla, Toffee with notes of Chamomile, Bright Citrus and Peach

coffees.name: Peru Chirapa Shade
coffees.notes: Clean apple, sweet cocoa nibs, and a rich, bready malt background. Mellow finish with a hint of tobacco. Soft body and soft acidity for an approachable, consistent cup.

coffees.name: Peru Finca La Esperanza RFA
coffees.notes: Chocolate & cherry, toasty, nutty sweet aroma; citrus, malt, pine, semi-sweet chocolate finish; full body, low acidity, balanced and lingering; bakerâ€™s cocoa, tangerine, peach, almond finish.

coffees.name: Chow Roma Italiano
coffees.notes: Classic Italian-style espresso blend with bold crema and syrupy body. Rich dark chocolate and cocoa base layered with vanilla, caramel, and honey sweetness. Subtle cedar, spice, and tobacco depth from Sumatra with a hint of citrus and herbal brightness from Vietnam. Long, bittersweet cocoa finish with toffee and sandalwood notes.

coffees.name: Doghouse Espresso
coffees.notes: Post-roast espresso blend with dense crema and syrupy body. Deep dark chocolate core with molasses and toasted sugar sweetness. Warming cedar spice and sweet tobacco depth lifted by a bright ribbon of candied citrus. Long, cocoa-rich finish with hints of vanilla and caramelized almond.

coffees.name: Peru Quile Smile
coffees.notes: Cane sugar sweetness with layered vanilla, honey, and soft floral tones. Smooth, medium body with a mellow, lingering finish.
